TypeSignature.Value: public class CredentialCache : System.Collections.IEnumerable, System.Net.ICredentials, System.Net.ICredentialsByHost

Public Class CredentialCache Implements ICredentials, ICredentialsByHost, IEnumerable
public ref class CredentialCache : System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Net::ICredentials, System::Net::ICredentialsByHost
type CredentialCache = class interface ICredentials interface ICredentialsByHost interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 为多个凭据提供存储空间。

span.span: Provides storage for multiple credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储了多个 Internet 资源的凭据。The class stores credentials for multiple Internet resources. 应用程序需要访问多个资源可以存储在这些资源的凭据实例，然后提供一组适当的 Internet 资源时所需的凭据。Applications that need to access multiple resources can store the credentials for those resources in a instance that then provides the proper set of credentials to the Internet resource when required. 当调用方法，它将统一资源标识符 (URI) 进行比较并且提供与身份验证类型存储在缓存中，并返回第一组相匹配的凭据。When the method is called, it compares the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and authentication type provided with those stored in the cache and returns the first set of credentials that match. 属性包含的系统凭据的当前安全上下文。The property contains the system credentials of the current security context. 对于客户端应用程序，这些表示用户名、 密码和域的当前登录的用户。For client applications, these represent the user name, password, and domain of the user who is currently logged in. 对于 ASP.NET 应用程序，默认凭据，登录的用户或被模拟的用户的用户凭据。For ASP.NET applications, the default credentials are the user credentials of the logged-in user or the user being impersonated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化具有多个安全凭据和使用这些凭据与。The following code example initializes a with multiple security credentials and uses those credentials with a . [!code-cpp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 向凭据缓存添加一个要与 SMTP 以外的协议一起使用的 实例，并将其与统一资源标识符 (URI) 前缀和身份验证协议关联。

span.span: Adds a instance to the credential cache for use with protocols other than SMTP and associates it with a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix and authentication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的位置实例以用于协议而不是到 SMTP 。The method places a instance for use with protocols other than SMTP into the . 缓存将凭据存储在向其添加的顺序。The cache stores credentials in the order in which they are added to it. 当方法调用时，它将返回正确匹配实例。When the method is called, it returns the proper matching instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化具有多个安全凭据和使用这些凭据与。The following code example initializes a with multiple security credentials and uses those credentials with a . [!code-cpp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CredentialCache.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic CredentialCache.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 向凭据缓存添加要与 SMTP 一起使用的 实例，并将其与主机、端口和身份验证协议关联。

span.span: Adds a instance for use with SMTP to the credential cache and associates it with a host computer, port, and authentication protocol.

summary.span: 使用此方法添加的凭据仅对 SMTP 有效。

span.span: Credentials added using this method are valid for SMTP only.

summary.span: 此方法对 HTTP 或 FTP 请求无效。

span.span: This method does not work for HTTP or FTP requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是将实例以用于到 SMTP 。This method places a instance for use with SMTP into the . 缓存将凭据存储在向其添加的顺序。The cache stores credentials in the order in which they are added to it. 当调用方法时，它将返回实例选择的匹配`host`， `port`，和`authType`。When the method is called, it returns a instance that is selected by matching the `host`, `port`, and `authType`. 不区分大小写进行比较。The comparison is done case-insensitively. 支持的值`authType`为"NTLM"、"Digest"、"Kerberos"和"协商"。The supported values for `authType` are "NTLM", "Digest", "Kerberos", and "Negotiate". 使用此方法添加的凭据的有效期与 SMTP 一起使用。Credentials added with this method are only valid for use with SMTP. 此方法不适用于 HTTP 或 FTP 协议。This method does not work for HTTP or FTP protocols. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化具有多个安全凭据与 SMTP 一起使用，并使用其中一个凭据与。The following code example initializes a with multiple security credentials for use with SMTP and uses one of those credentials with a . [!code-cpp[NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCL_Credential.Cache.Add_SMTP/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取应用程序的系统凭据。

span.span: Gets the system credentials of the application.

value.span: 表示应用程序的系统凭据的 。

span.span: An that represents the system credentials of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于 NTLM、 协商和基于 Kerberos 的身份验证。The property applies only to NTLM, negotiate, and Kerberos-based authentication. 表示在其中运行应用程序的当前安全上下文的系统凭据。 represents the system credentials for the current security context in which the application is running. 对于客户端应用程序，这些通常是用户的运行应用程序的 Windows 凭据 （用户名、 密码和域）。For a client-side application, these are usually the Windows credentials (user name, password, and domain) of the user running the application. 对于 ASP.NET 应用程序，默认凭据，登录的用户或被模拟的用户的用户凭据。For ASP.NET applications, the default credentials are the user credentials of the logged-in user, or the user being impersonated. 若要获取的凭据实例，请使用属性。To get the credentials as a instance, use the property. 支持的值`authType`为"NTLM"、"Digest"、"Kerberos"和"协商"。The supported values for `authType` are "NTLM", "Digest", "Kerberos", and "Negotiate". 此方法不适用于 HTTP 或 FTP 协议。This method does not work for HTTP or FTP protocols. > [!NOTE] > 返回实例不能用于查看用户名、 密码或域的当前安全上下文。The instance returned by cannot be used to view the user name, password, or domain of the current security context. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来获取应用程序的系统凭据。The following code example uses the property to get the system credentials of the application. [!code-cpp[CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials/CPP/credentialcache_defaultcredentials.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials/CS/credentialcache_defaultcredentials.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_DefaultCredentials/VB/credentialcache_defaultcredentials.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前安全上下文的网络凭据。

span.span: Gets the network credentials of the current security context.

value.span: 表示当前用户或应用程序的网络凭据的 。

span.span: An that represents the network credentials of the current user or application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的凭据属性是仅适用于 NTLM、 协商和基于 Kerberos 的身份验证。The credentials returned by the property is applicable only for NTLM, negotiate, and Kerberos-based authentication. 返回的凭据表示在其中运行应用程序的当前安全上下文的身份验证凭据。The credentials returned by represents the authentication credentials for the current security context in which the application is running. 对于客户端应用程序，这些通常是用户的运行应用程序的 Windows 凭据 （用户名、 密码和域）。For a client-side application, these are usually the Windows credentials (user name, password, and domain) of the user running the application. 对于 ASP.NET 应用程序，默认网络凭据，登录的用户或被模拟的用户的用户凭据。For ASP.NET applications, the default network credentials are the user credentials of the logged-in user, or the user being impersonated.

permission.span: 用于读取 USERNAME 的环境变量。

span.span: for reading the USERNAME environment variable.

summary.span: 返回与指定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 和身份验证类型相关联的 实例。

span.span: Returns the instance associated with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and authentication type.

returns.span: ；如果缓存中没有匹配的凭据，则为 。

span.span: A or, if there is no matching credential in the cache, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索，并返回指定的 URI 和授权类型的实例。The method searches the and returns the instance for the specified URI and authorization type. 如果不包含匹配实例，`null`返回。If the contains no matching instance, `null` is returned. 使用在缓存中的最长匹配的 URI 前缀，以确定要返回的授权类型的凭据集。 uses the longest matching URI prefix in the cache to determine which set of credentials to return for an authorization type. 下表显示了示例。The following table shows examples. |URI 前缀URI Prefix|匹配Matches| |----------------|-------------| |`http://www.contoso.com/portal/news.htm`|在特定的 Web 页的请求`news.htm`。Requests for the specific Web page `news.htm`.| |`http://www.contoso.com/portal/`|中的所有内容的请求`portal`路径，除非页`news.htm`。Requests for all content in the `portal` path, except the page `news.htm`.| |`http://www.contoso.com/`|在所有资源的请求`www.contoso.com`，除了那些在`portal`路径。Requests for all resources at `www.contoso.com`, except those in the `portal` path.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以返回实例与指定的 URI 和身份验证类型相关联。The following code example uses the method to return the instance associated with the specified URI and authentication type. [!code-cpp[CredentialCache_GetCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_GetCredential/CPP/credentialcache_getcredential.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CredentialCache_GetCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_GetCredential/CS/credentialcache_getcredential.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CredentialCache_GetCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_GetCredential/VB/credentialcache_getcredential.vb#1)]

span.span: Deletes a instance from the cache if it is associated with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix and authentication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法移除实例与如果指定的 URI 前缀和身份验证协议与那些与凭据关联匹配。This method removes a instance from the if the specified URI prefix and authentication protocol match those associated with the credential. 多次调用方法的相同不起作用。Multiple calls to the method for the same have no effect. 如果`authType`是`null`或`uriPrefix`是`null`，或没有匹配的凭据是在缓存中找到，此方法不执行任何操作。If `authType` is `null` or `uriPrefix` is `null`, or no matching credential is found in the cache, this method does nothing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法来删除从缓存实例。The following code example uses this method to delete a instance from the cache. [!code-cpp[CredentialCache_Add_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_Add_Remove/CPP/credentialcache_add_remove.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CredentialCache_Add_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_Add_Remove/CS/credentialcache_add_remove.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CredentialCache_Add_Remove#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CredentialCache_Add_Remove/VB/credentialcache_add_remove.vb#3)]

span.span: Deletes a instance from the cache if it is associated with the specified host, port, and authentication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法移除实例与如果指定的主机、 端口和身份验证协议与匹配那些与凭据关联。This method removes a instance from the if the specified host, port, and authentication protocol match those associated with the credential. 多次调用方法的相同不起作用。Multiple calls to the method for the same have no effect. 如果`authType`是`null`或`uriPrefix`是`null`，或没有匹配的凭据是在缓存中找到，此方法不执行任何操作。If `authType` is `null` or `uriPrefix` is `null`, or no matching credential is found in the cache, this method does nothing.
